title.bibl: Magyar Tribune, Dec. 21, 1917. Christmas Church Services

div.bibl: Magyar Tribune, Dec. 21, 1917. CHRISTMAS CHURCH SERVICES

body.p: The Chicago Central Reformed Hungarian Church will hold repentance service this coming Sunday at their church, 2506 West Superior Street. The services will begin at 11:30 A. M. On Christmas day services will be held in the same place and at the same time. On this day the Lord's supper will be served.

The officials of this congregation ask all Hungarian people living in Chicago and vicinity, regardless whether they are members of the congregation or not, to take part in celebrating christianity's greatest holiday. So our souls may live in the true spirit of these services.
